Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: ATTIVITA' DI REFERAGGIO PER RIVISTE SCIENTIFICHE: Annals of Applied Probability, Methodology and Computing in Applied Probability, Statistics and Probability Letters, Annals of Statistics; Journal of the Royal Statistical Society-Series B; Biometrika; Journal of the American Statistical Association; Bayesian Analysis; Electronic Journal of Statistics; Statistics and Computing; Computational Mechanics; Journal of Approximate reasoning; Statistical Methods and its applications; Journal of Statistical Planning and Inference; Mathematics and Computers in simulations; Revista Matemática Complutense; Annals of the Institute of Mathematical Statistics; AISTAT 2014;

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Ottawa, Canada, Workshop on Probabilistic Symmetries and Their Applications. "Generating CID sequences". Contributed Talk.
Fleurance, France, "New directions in Monte Carlo Methods". An extension of Peskun and Tierney Ordering to continuous time Markov Chains. Contributed Talk.

Bonn, Germany. Complex Stochastic Systems: Discrete vs. Continuous. W1 Stochastic processes and algorithms. Hausdorff Research Institute for Mathematics. "Covariance and Peskun ordering in continuous time". INVITED SPEAKER.
Bormio, Italia, McMski2: MCMC in Theory and Practice. "Covariance and Peskun ordering in continuous time". Contributed Poster.
Jaca, Spain. SPO 2009. Vectors of Dependent Poisson Dirichlet Processes. Contributed Talk.
Harvard, Boston, USA, New england Statistics Symposium. "Vectors of Dependent Poisson Dirichlet Processes". INVITED SPEAKER.
Gothenburg, Sweden, IMS 2010. "Vectors of Dependent Poisson Dirichlet Processes", Contributed Talk.
London, UK. ERCIM 2010. "Vectors of Dependent Poisson Dirichlet Processes". INVITED SPEAKER.
Istanbul, Turkey, Yeditepe International Research Conference on Bayesian Learning. "CID sequences and Bayesian non parametrics". INVITED SPEAKER.
Madrid, Spain. Bayesian Inference for Stochastic Processes (BISP) 7. "CID sequences and Bayesian non parametrics". INVITED SPEAKER.
Jaca, Spain, SPO 2011. CID sequences and Bayesian non parametrics. Contributed Talk.

Murcia, Spain, Tenth International Conference on Ordered Statistical Data and Their Applications. Exchangeable occupancy models and discrete processes with the generalized uniform order statistics property. Contributed Talk.
Antalya, Turkey. International workshop on applied probability. "Classes of Exchangeable Occupancy Models and related transformations". INVITED SPEAKER.

Modena, Italia. Workshop in honor of Prof. ssa Patrizia Berti: Alcuni argomenti di Probabilitá, Statistica e Teoria della Misura. "Vettori di misure di probabilita’ aleatorie: dalle copule di Lévy alle misure aleatorie composte". INVITED SPEAKER.
London, UK. CMStatistics. Compound Random Measures and their use in Bayesian nonparametrics. Contributed Talk.
Toronto, Canada. International Workshop in Applied Probability. "Compound Random Measures and their use in Bayesian nonparametrics". INVITED SPEAKER.
Toronto, Canada. International Workshop in Applied Probability. "Limiting behaviour of the stationary search cost distribution driven by a generalized gamma process.". INVITED SPEAKER.
Sevilla, Spain, CMStatistics. "Bayesian nonparametric conditional copula estimation of twin data". INVITED SPEAKER.
Paris, France, 11th Conference on Bayesian Nonparametrics. "Some recent constructions of vectors of dependent completely random measures". INVITED SPEAKER.
Glasgow, Scotland, United Kingdom, RSS 2017 Annual Conference. "Bayesian nonparametric conditional copula estimation of twin data". Rapid fire talk.

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Engineering and Physical Sciences Research Council (EPSRC) Peer Review Associate College member.
Engineering and Physical Sciences Research Council (EPSRC) Peer Review Full College member.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Involved as Co-Investigator in the project "Análisis de Datos de Muy Alta Dimensión en Economía y Empresa". Ministerio de ciencias e innovacion (Spain). Principal investigator: Juan Romo Urroz. 66.781,11 euros. January,2012-December, 2014.

Involved as Co-Investigator in the project "Nuevos métodos computacionales para sistemas espaciales dinámicos". Programa Hispano-Brasileno de cooperacion interuniversitario. Ministerio de Educacion, Cultura y Deporte (Spain). Principal investigator: Joaquin Miguez. 36.000 euros. January,2012-December, 2013.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Assistant Professor of Probability and Mathematical Statistics, Universidad de Navarra, November, 2008-August, 2010.
Assistant Professor of Statistics, Universidad Carlos III de Madrid, September, 2010-June, 2013
Senior Lecturer in Statistics, University of Kent, July, 2013-January, 2017
Reader in Statistics, University of Kent, January, 2017-present

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: September, 2009-August,2010. "Estadistica no parametrica y bayesiana para economia y empresa". PIUNA project Universidad de Navarra. Principal investigator: Fabrizio Leisen. 12.950 euros.
September, 2009-August,2010. "Estadistica no parametrica y bayesiana para economia y empresa". PIUNA project Universidad de Navarra. Principal investigator: Fabrizio Leisen. 12.950 euros.
June,2011-June, 2012. "Bayesian Analysis of Economics Data". Universidad Carlos III de Madrid. Principal Investigator: Fabrizio Leisen. 1.250 euros.

September,2011-December, 2011. Ayudas para la movilidad de investigadores de la Universidad Carlos III de Madrid en centros de investigacion nacionales o extranjeros. INDIVIDUAL GRANT. Principal investigator: Fabrizio Leisen. 5.060 euros.
March,2014-December,2014. "Bayesian Computational methods with Bootstrap Techniques". Royal Society. RG2014R1. INDIVIDUAL GRANT. Principal investigator: Fabrizio Leisen. 5.000 pounds.

May,2014-February,2018. "Flexible Bayesian non-parametric priors". European Commission. FP7 Marie Curie Career Integration Grant. INDIVIDUAL GRANT. Principal investigator: Fabrizio Leisen. 100.000 euros.

December,2015-November,2017. Empirical and Bootstrap likelihood procedures for Approximate Bayesian Inference". Royal Society International Exchanges. Principal investigator: Fabrizio Leisen, Co-investigators: Brunero Liseo and Clara Grazian. 11.820 pounds.
